content: ``` Initiates the sign in process for the user. This will open a popup window with the appropriate authentication method. Puter automatically handles the authentication process and will resolve the promise when the user has signed in. It is important to note that all essential methods in Puter handle authentication automatically. This method is only necessary if you want to handle authentication manually, for example if you want to build your own custom authentication flow. ## Syntax ```js puter.auth.signIn(); ``` ## Parameters None ## Return value A `Promise` that will resolve to `true` when the user has signed in. The promise will never reject. ## Example ```html;auth-sign-in ``` Signs the user out of the application. ## Syntx ```js puter.auth.signOut(); ``` ## Parameters None ## Return value None ## Example ```html;auth-sign-out ```
